title: "Our rivers, lakes and estuaries are the lifeblood of our landscape and support our ecosystems, and our health and wellbeing. But they are struggling. They do not have the resilience to cope with the… | Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Ireland
description:
"Our rivers, lakes and estuaries are the lifeblood of our landscape and support our ecosystems, and our health and wellbeing. But they are struggling. They do not have the resilience to cope with the challenges they face, now and in the future. Surface water quality overall has been in decline since before the first of these assessments was carried out by the EPA in the late 2000s.

It is very disappointing to report that water quality is not improving despite the many actions that are underway, across all sectors. It’s clear the scale and pace of implementation needs to be increased and sustained.”

Dr Eimear Cotter, Director of the EPA’s Office of Evidence and Assessment, on the Water Quality in Ireland Report 2019-2024.

To find out more, read the full report https://lnkd.in/e86rHuvt

title: Open Careers | Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Ireland
description:
Senior Manager (Level 2) Research Programme
The EPA is recruiting for the role of Senior Manager (Level 2) to lead the EPA’s Research Strategy Team. This is an exciting senior management opportunity to lead a team of scientific officers, driving the strategic focus of the research programme and ensuring our funded research addresses key policy challenges related to environmental protection, climate change and sustainability.

Location: EPA Headquarters, Wexford or the EPA Regional Inspectorate in Dublin or Cork
Closing Date: 4.00pm on Wednesday 29th October 2025

Apply now at www.epa.ie/careers or at the link in our bio.

-
Clár Taighde - Bainisteoir Sinsearach (Leibhéal 2)
Tá an Ghníomhaireacht um Chaomhnú Comshaoil (GCC) ag earcú do ról mar Bhainisteoir Sinsearach (Leibhéal 2) chun ceannasaíocht a ghlacadh ar Fhoireann Straitéise Taighde an GCC. Is deis spreagúil í seo do bhainistíocht shinsearach chun foireann oifigeach eolaíochta a threorú, fócas straitéiseach an chláir taighde a thiomáint agus a chinntiú go dtugann ár dtaighde maoinithe aghaidh ar dhúshláin bheartais thábhachtacha a bhaineann le cosaint an chomhshaoil, athrú aeráide agus inbhuanaitheacht.

Láthair: Ceanncheathrú GCC i Loch Garman nó Cigireacht Réigiúnach GCC i mBaile Átha Cliath nó i gCorcaigh
Dáta Deiridh: 4.00pm, Dé Céadaoin, an 29 Deireadh Fómhair 2025

Déan iarratas anois ag www.epa.ie/careers publicjobs
